non_residential_details.development_type: Change of Use with Extension(s) over 999sqm

description: Demolition of some existing buildings, extension and alteration of buildings retained, and erection of new part four (4) storey with basement and part five (5) storey building with a maximum parapet height of 21.8m AOD to provide 2951m² (GIA) of commercial space (use class B1, with up to 700m² A1 and D1 use) with yard area, 44 residential dwellings (4 x studios, 15 x 1 bed, 15 x 2 bed and 10 x 3 bed), upper level amenity areas, cycle parking and refuse/recycling stores
